mapper.select: select id as "id", date_format(start_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as "startDate", date_format(end_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as "endDate", base_level as "baseLevel", detail as "detail" from todo_t t where #{year}>=year(t.start_date) and year(t.end_date)>=#{year}
select flow_id as "flowId", name as "name", status as "status" from app_project_t t
